Title: Requires the board of elections in the city of New York to release certain data relating to ranked choice elections
Summary: Requires the board of elections in the city of New York to release data on how voters ranked all candidates in a ranked choice election, even if a single candidate received a majority of highest rank votes and the tabulation process was not triggered.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the board of elections in the city of New York to release certain data relating to ranked choice elections
